Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CODIFIED ORDINANCES OF SPRINGBORO, OHIO

PART TWELVE - PLANNING AND ZONING CODE

TITLE SIX - Zoning

CHAPTER 1278 Nonconforming Uses

1278.01 INTENT.

1278.02 INCOMPATIBILITY OF NONCONFORMING USES; EXTENSION OR ENLARGEMENT.

1278.03 BUILDINGS UNDER CONSTRUCTION.

1278.04 NONCONFORMING LOTS OF RECORD.

1278.05 NONCONFORMING LOTS OF RECORD IN COMBINATION.

1278.06 NONCONFORMING USES OF LAND.

1278.07 NONCONFORMING STRUCTURES.

1278.08 NONCONFORMING USES OF STRUCTURES OR OF STRUCTURES AND LAND IN COMBINATION.

1278.09 REPAIRS AND MAINTENANCE.

1278.10 CONDITIONAL USES.

1278.11 LIMITED RELIEF FROM RESTRICTIONS AVAILABLE TO NONCONFORMING BUSINESS OR INDUSTRIAL USES OR STRUCTURES IN BUSINESS OR INDUSTRIAL DISTRICTS.
